amendment.description: To establish a United States drug interdiction coordinator for Federal agencies.

action.text: Amendment SA 3856 ruled non-germane by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3856.
Amendment SA 3856 proposed by Senator Sessions for Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR S10345-10346) To establish a United States drug interdiction coordinator for Federal agencies.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3856 proposed by Senator Sessions for Senator Grassley.
